Articles.Content: So apparently there's this 2D physics sandbox game that claims you can make anything from games, spaceships, giant robots, and even a 2D version of KSP if you have enough programming skills. Personally, I've been playing Algodoo for a while now and i find it extremely fun. I'm thinking on learning Thyme so i can make my contraptions better and hopefully build a computer (if it's possible) in it, using Thyme. It's amazing, go check it out!
